SELECT f.feedno,f.userid,f.feedcontent,f.feedImg,f.feedImgs,f.feedgoodcnt,f.feedloc,f.feeddate,f.feedupdate,f.feedlock FROM feed f, feedtag t where f.feedno=t.feedno AND (f.feedcontent LIKE ${keyword} OR t.tagname LIKE ${keyword})
